description: Sanskrit listening comprehension exercises organized by proficiency level

beginner.title: Self Introduction
beginner.sanskrit: अहं रामः अस्मि। अहं छात्रः अस्मि।
beginner.romanization: ahaṃ rāmaḥ asmi. ahaṃ chātraḥ asmi.
beginner.english: I am Rama. I am a student.

beginner.title: Simple Greeting
beginner.sanskrit: नमस्ते। कथं अस्ति? अहं कुशली अस्मि।
beginner.romanization: namaste. kathaṃ asti? ahaṃ kuśalī asmi.
beginner.english: Hello. How are you? I am well.

beginner.title: Family Introduction
beginner.sanskrit: मम पिता शिक्षकः अस्ति। मम माता गृहिणी अस्ति।
beginner.romanization: mama pitā śikṣakaḥ asti. mama mātā gṛhiṇī asti.
beginner.english: My father is a teacher. My mother is a homemaker.

beginner.title: Simple Actions
beginner.sanskrit: बालकः पुस्तकं पठति। बालिका गीतं गायति।
beginner.romanization: bālakaḥ pustakaṃ paṭhati. bālikā gītaṃ gāyati.
beginner.english: The boy reads a book. The girl sings a song.

beginner.title: Basic Numbers
beginner.sanskrit: एकं द्वे त्रीणि चत्वारि पञ्च। एते पञ्च सङ्ख्याः।
beginner.romanization: ekaṃ dve trīṇi catvāri pañca. ete pañca saṅkhyāḥ.
beginner.english: One two three four five. These are five numbers.

beginner.title: Nature Words
beginner.sanskrit: सूर्यः उदेति। पक्षिणः गायन्ति। वृक्षाः हरिताः सन्ति।
beginner.romanization: sūryaḥ udeti. pakṣiṇaḥ gāyanti. vṛkṣāḥ haritāḥ santi.
beginner.english: The sun rises. The birds sing. The trees are green.

beginner.title: Daily Routine - Morning
beginner.sanskrit: प्रातः उत्तिष्ठामि। मुखं प्रक्षालयामि। भोजनं खादामि।
beginner.romanization: prātaḥ uttiṣṭhāmi. mukhaṃ prakṣālayāmi. bhojanaṃ khādāmi.
beginner.english: I wake up in the morning. I wash my face. I eat food.

questions.question: When does the speaker wake up?

beginner.title: Simple Location
beginner.sanskrit: गृहं अत्र अस्ति। विद्यालयः तत्र अस्ति। मन्दिरं समीपे अस्ति।
beginner.romanization: gṛhaṃ atra asti. vidyālayaḥ tatra asti. mandiraṃ samīpe asti.
beginner.english: The house is here. The school is there. The temple is nearby.

beginner.title: Pronouns Practice
beginner.sanskrit: अहं गच्छामि। त्वं पठसि। सः खादति। सा पिबति।
beginner.romanization: ahaṃ gacchāmi. tvaṃ paṭhasi. saḥ khādati. sā pibati.
beginner.english: I go. You read. He eats. She drinks.

beginner.title: Simple Descriptions
beginner.sanskrit: पुष्पं सुन्दरम् अस्ति। पुष्पं रक्तवर्णम् अस्ति। पुष्पं सुगन्धि अस्ति।
beginner.romanization: puṣpaṃ sundaram asti. puṣpaṃ raktavarṇam asti. puṣpaṃ sugandhi asti.
beginner.english: The flower is beautiful. The flower is red. The flower is fragrant.

elementary.title: School Scene
elementary.sanskrit: शिक्षकः कक्षायां प्रविशति। छात्राः उत्तिष्ठन्ति। शिक्षकः पाठं पाठयति।
elementary.romanization: śikṣakaḥ kakṣāyāṃ praviśati. chātrāḥ uttiṣṭhanti. śikṣakaḥ pāṭhaṃ pāṭhayati.
elementary.english: The teacher enters the classroom. The students stand up. The teacher teaches a lesson.

elementary.title: Market Visit
elementary.sanskrit: अहं आपणं गच्छामि। फलानि क्रीणामि। गृहं प्रत्यागच्छामि।
elementary.romanization: ahaṃ āpaṇaṃ gacchāmi. phalāni krīṇāmi. gṛhaṃ pratyāgacchāmi.
elementary.english: I go to the market. I buy fruits. I return home.

elementary.title: Weather Description
elementary.sanskrit: अद्य वर्षा भवति। मेघाः कृष्णाः सन्ति। वातः वाति। जनाः गृहे तिष्ठन्ति।
elementary.romanization: adya varṣā bhavati. meghāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ santi. vātaḥ vāti. janāḥ gṛhe tiṣṭhanti.
elementary.english: Today it rains. The clouds are dark. The wind blows. People stay at home.

elementary.title: Animal Story
elementary.sanskrit: वने एकः सिंहः वसति। सः बलवान् अस्ति। सर्वे पशवः तं भीताः।
elementary.romanization: vane ekaḥ siṃhaḥ vasati. saḥ balavān asti. sarve paśavaḥ taṃ bhītāḥ.
elementary.english: A lion lives in the forest. He is powerful. All animals are afraid of him.

elementary.title: Festival Description
elementary.sanskrit: अद्य दीपावलिः अस्ति। जनाः दीपान् प्रज्वालयन्ति। बालकाः पटाखान् चालयन्ति। सर्वे आनन्दिताः।
elementary.romanization: adya dīpāvaliḥ asti. janāḥ dīpān prajvālayanti. bālakāḥ paṭākhān cālayanti. sarve ānanditāḥ.
elementary.english: Today is Diwali. People light lamps. Children burst crackers. Everyone is happy.

intermediate.title: Philosophical Teaching
intermediate.sanskrit: गुरुः शिष्यान् उपदिशति। विद्या धनम् सर्वधनप्रधानम्। विद्या दत्ता विनयं प्राप्नोति।
intermediate.romanization: guruḥ śiṣyān upadiśati. vidyā dhanam sarvadhanaprdhānam. vidyā dattā vinayaṃ prāpnoti.
intermediate.english: The teacher instructs the students. Knowledge is wealth, the best of all wealth. Knowledge given brings humility.

intermediate.title: From Bhagavad Gita
intermediate.sanskrit: कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन। मा कर्मफलहेतुर्भूः मा ते सङ्गोऽस्त्वकर्मणि।
intermediate.romanization: karmaṇyevādhikāraste mā phaleṣu kadācana. mā karmaphalaheturbhūḥ mā te saṅgo'stvakarmaṇi.
intermediate.english: You have right to action alone, never to its fruits. Never consider yourself the cause of results, and never be attached to not doing your duty.

questions.question: What do we have a right to?
What should we not be attached to?

intermediate.title: Yoga Philosophy
intermediate.sanskrit: योगः चित्तवृत्तिनिरोधः। तदा द्रष्टुः स्वरूपे अवस्थानम्। अभ्यासवैराग्याभ्यां तन्निरोधः।
intermediate.romanization: yogaḥ cittavṛttinirodhaḥ. tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe avasthānam. abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṃ tannirodhaḥ.
intermediate.english: Yoga is the cessation of mental fluctuations. Then the seer abides in its own nature. The cessation is through practice and detachment.

questions.question: What is yoga according to this passage?

advanced.title: Upanishadic Prayer
advanced.sanskrit: असतो मा सद्गमय। तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय। मृत्योर्मा अमृतं गमय। ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः।
advanced.romanization: asato mā sadgamaya. tamaso mā jyotirgamaya. mṛtyormā amṛtaṃ gamaya. oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ.
advanced.english: Lead me from untruth to truth. Lead me from darkness to light. Lead me from death to immortality. Om peace, peace, peace.

questions.question: How many times is peace repeated?

advanced.title: Shanti Mantra
advanced.sanskrit: सहनाववतु। सह नौ भुनक्तु। सह वीर्यं करवावहै। तेजस्विनावधीतमस्तु मा विद्विषावहै।
advanced.romanization: sahanāvavatu. saha nau bhunaktu. saha vīryaṃ karavāvahai. tejasvinavadhītamastu mā vidviṣāvahai.
advanced.english: May He protect us both. May He nourish us both. May we work together with energy. May our study be illuminating. May we not hate each other.

proficient.title: Gayatri Mantra
proficient.sanskrit: ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्।
proficient.romanization: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt.
proficient.english: We meditate on the glory of that Being who has produced this universe; may He enlighten our minds.

proficient.title: Ishavasya Upanishad Opening
proficient.sanskrit: ईशावास्यमिदं सर्वं यत्किञ्च जगत्यां जगत्। तेन त्यक्तेन भुञ्जीथा मा गृधः कस्यस्विद्धनम्।
proficient.romanization: īśāvāsyamidaṃ sarvaṃ yatkiñca jagatyāṃ jagat. tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasyasviddhanam.
proficient.english: All this, whatever moves in this moving world, is enveloped by the Lord. Enjoy through renunciation. Do not covet, for whose is wealth?
